messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 494
messages.msgSnippet: With all due respect to the wonderful LLL leaders on this list, I think posts such as the ones I ve read give LLL a bad name. If women have a view on
messages.messageBody:
With all due respect to the wonderful LLL leaders on this list, I think posts
such as the ones I've read give LLL a bad name. If women have a view on
breastfeeding, I think it is important to state that it is your own opinion
and not related to La Leche League's views. Some women come on stronger than
others and I don't think it honestly reflects the true mission of LLL. And
since this probably should be a private discussion, I'd be happy to
correspond privately.

Wendy
